remarks: Decompose the integral of a complex function into real and imaginary parts.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Aug-2014.)
statement:
itgcnval.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) $.
itgcnval.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. L^1 ) $.
itgcnval $p |- ( ph -> S. A B _d x = ( S. A ( Re ` B ) _d x + ( _i x. S. A ( Im ` B ) _d x ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d V x $.
$d ph x $.
